wikipedia_page.main: Lyn Perkins is a former Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler and coach.He won a silver medal in the pairs with Spencer Wilshire at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane. He is a three times Welsh National Champion, winning the pairs with Wilshire in 1975, 1978 and 1980, when bowling for the Tonypandy Bowls Club.He was the coach for the lawn bowls team at the 2006 Commonwealth Games in Melbourne.
